manipulators.description: Ctrl + U to delete backward from point to the beginning of line.
Ctrl + W to delete word behind point

rules.description: Ctrl + B/F to move between words
Function keys, movement, brightness, volumen and media conntrols
Symbols in upper row, Number row and hard to reach symbols in lower row

manipulators.description: Spacebar to R_CMD on hold, SPC on tap
L_ALT to L_CTRL on hold, ESC on tap
Ctrl + U to delete backward from point to the beginning of line.
Ctrl + W to delete word behind point

Function keys, movement, brightness, volumen and media conntrols

manipulators.description: Change spacebar to right_command. (Post return if pressed alone)
Change right_command to right_shift. (Post escape if pressed alone)
Change left_command to left_shift. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
Change right_option to right_option. (Post open parenthesis if pressed alone)
Change left_option to right_control. (Post close parenthesis if pressed alone)
